uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

base_ethernet_address.description: MAC address of the base Ethernet interface.

current_ip_address.description: Current IP address is a vlan ip address connected to Cloud Manager/Central. It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

total_memory_in_bytes.description: The total memory (RAM) available to the system.

total_poe_consumption.description: The total PoE consumption It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

uplink_port.description: The uplink port(port_id) of switch connected to Cloud Manager/Central. It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

total_poe_available.description: The total PoE power available. It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

total_poe_failover.description: The total PoE failover available. It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

total_poe_redundancy.description: The total PoE redundancy It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

total_poe_drawn.description: The total PoE drawn It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

total_poe_remaining.description: The total PoE remaining It will be displayed only when switch is connected to Cloud Manager/Central.

slot_poe_stats.description: PoE Slot Information This data will be sent only when a switch is connected to Central.
